definition: to show one's wealth/to let one's wealth show
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: Maintain modesty, don't show opulent, don't create envy and enemies.
sentences.chinese: 保持謙遜的作風，不要露富，以免引起嫉妒甚至樹敵。

sentences.english: The rising tide of anti-wealth sentiment could well affect how conspicuous the rich want to be.
sentences.chinese: 日益高漲的仇富情緒很可能影響富人對露富的程度。

definition: to parade one's wealth/to be ostentatious and extravagant
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: extravagant (idiom); to throw away money by the handful/wasteful
richly bedecked/dripping with gold and silver (idiom)
to reveal the cloven foot (idiom); to unmask one's true nature/to give the game away
to bewail one's poverty/to complain about being hard up/to pretend to be poor
